data.title: Greentown Management Completes Share Repurchase and CEO Increases Stake
data.description:
Greentown Management Holdings Co., Ltd. ( (HK:9979) ) has issued an announcement.

Greentown Management Holdings Co., Ltd. announced the completion of an on-market share repurchase, buying back 10 million shares, which accounts for approximately 0.49751% of its total issued share capital. This move, executed under the Share Repurchase Mandate, resulted in a reduction of the company’s total issued shares to 2 billion. Additionally, the company’s CEO, Mr. Wang Junfeng, increased his personal stake by purchasing 500,000 shares, reflecting his confidence in the company’s future prospects. These actions indicate a strategic effort to enhance shareholder value and demonstrate leadership’s commitment to the company’s growth.

The most recent analyst rating on (HK:9979) stock is a Buy with a HK$4.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Greentown Management Holdings Co., Ltd. stock, see the HK:9979 Stock Forecast page.

More about Greentown Management Holdings Co., Ltd.

Greentown Management Holdings Co., Ltd. is incorporated in the Cayman Islands and operates in the real estate management industry. The company focuses on providing property management services and is listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange.

Average Trading Volume: 6,075,775

Technical Sentiment Signal: Hold

Current Market Cap: HK$5.99B

data.title: Lufax Granted Extension for 2024 Annual Report Filing
data.description:
Lufax Holding Ltd Class A ( (HK:6623) ) just unveiled an update.

Lufax Holding Ltd has been granted an extension by the New York Stock Exchange to file its 2024 annual report on Form 20-F by April 30, 2026. The delay in filing is due to a change in the company’s auditors, with Ernst & Young and Ernst & Young Hua Ming LLP now appointed. The company is working diligently to meet the new deadline and regain compliance with the NYSE’s listing standards, as failure to do so could result in suspension and delisting procedures.

More about Lufax Holding Ltd Class A

Lufax Holding Ltd is a financial services company incorporated in the Cayman Islands. It primarily operates in the retail credit enablement sector, focusing on providing financial solutions and services to borrowers, platform investors, and other business partners. The company is listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange and the New York Stock Exchange.

Technical Sentiment Signal: Buy

Current Market Cap: HK$18.89B

data.title: Liaoning Port Reports Mixed Q3 2025 Financial Results
data.description:
Liaoning Port Company Limited Class H ( (HK:2880) ) has issued an update.

Liaoning Port Company Limited has released its unaudited financial results for the third quarter of 2025, showing a mixed performance. While the company reported a 6.11% increase in operating income for the quarter, net profit attributable to shareholders decreased by 30% compared to the same period last year. However, from the beginning of the year to the end of the reporting period, net profit attributable to shareholders increased by 37.51%, and net cash flows from operating activities saw a significant rise of 83.40%. These results indicate a strong operational cash flow and improved profitability over the year, despite the quarterly decline in net profit.

The most recent analyst rating on (HK:2880) stock is a Hold with a HK$1.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Liaoning Port Company Limited Class H stock, see the HK:2880 Stock Forecast page.

More about Liaoning Port Company Limited Class H

data.title: Kunlun Energy Transfers Equity in Strategic Move to Focus on Urban Gas
data.description:

Kunlun Energy Company Limited announced the transfer of equity interests in Xinjiang Xinjie Petroleum Co., Ltd. to PetroChina Xinjiang, a subsidiary of its controlling shareholder PetroChina. This transaction, valued at RMB13,503,500, is part of Kunlun Energy’s strategy to focus on its core activities, aiming to improve market share and operational efficiency. The disposal is classified as a connected transaction under Hong Kong’s Listing Rules, subject to reporting and announcement requirements but exempt from circular and independent shareholders’ approval.

data.title: JD Logistics Reports Increased Losses for Deppon in Q3 2025
data.description:
JD Logistics, Inc. ( (HK:2618) ) has provided an update.

JD Logistics, Inc. announced key financial information for its subsidiary, Deppon Logistics Co., Ltd., for the third quarter of 2025. Deppon reported a revenue of RMB 9.7 billion for the quarter, a slight decrease from the previous year, and a net loss attributable to shareholders of RMB 329 million, reflecting a significant increase in losses compared to the previous year. Despite the operational challenges, Deppon generated a net cash flow from operating activities of RMB 1.79 billion for the nine months ended September 30, 2025, though this marked a decrease of 22.15% from the previous year. The financial results highlight ongoing challenges in the logistics sector and may impact JD Logistics’ market positioning and stakeholder confidence.

The most recent analyst rating on (HK:2618) stock is a Buy with a HK$15.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on JD Logistics, Inc. stock, see the HK:2618 Stock Forecast page.
